name: Piloting Planes (alzhu1)
description:
Shoot em up made roughly in 2 days, move with WASD/arrow keys and press Space to shoot. Word of caution, collision is a bit janky at points.

Art from Kenney: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pixel-shmup

Font is Pixellari: https://www.dafont.com/pixellari.font
